DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether ranibizumab is effective in the treatment of choroidal neovascularization secondary to causes other then wet macular-degeneration.
DOC.brief_title: Safety Study of Ranibizumab Eye Injections to Treat Choroidal Neovascularization That Was Caused Other Than by Age-Related Macular Degeneration.
DOC.criteria: active choroidal neovascularization pregnancy,agerelated macular degeneration, current eye infection or recent eye surgery, participating in other eye studies
DOC.keyword: Choroidal Neovascularization Not related to Age-Related Macular Degeneration
